definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: shatter (BAram. [[חֲשַׁל]] shatter; NH Pi., ‖[[משׁבר]]; Syr. h.4l forge a metal, Ar. h.asala drive cattle violently; As. ḫašâlu, shatter, destroy Zim:BP 12 Dl:Pr 42)—

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pt. fig. [[כָּל־]] [[הַנֶּחֱשָׁלִים]] De 25:18 all the shattered ones, i.e. those broken down, worn out, sq. [[וְאַתָּה עָיֵף וְיׇגֵעַ]]; others think = [[חלשׁ]].
